params._newBatchId: new batchId.      Note from maintainer:      for compatibility, the event is retained

ClaimRewards(uint256,address,uint256,uin.details: Emitted when sequencer withdraw rewards in 'withdrawRewards' or 'unlockClaim'

params.sequencerId: unique integer to identify a sequencer.

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params.nonce: to synchronize the events in themis.
params.sequencerId: unique integer to identify a sequencer.

Locked(address,uint256,uint256,uint256,u.details: Emitted when sequencer locks in '_lockFor()' in LockingPool.

params.nonce: to synchronize the events in themis.
params.sequencerId: unique integer to identify a sequencer.

Relocked(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when the sequencer increase lock amount in 'relock()'.

params.sequencerId: unique integer to identify a sequencer.

SetMaxLock(uint256).details: Emitted when min lock amount update in 'UpdateMaxAmounts'

SetMinLock(uint256).details: Emitted when min lock amount update in 'UpdateMinAmounts'

SetRewardPayer(address).details: Emitted when the reward payer is changed

SignerChange(uint256,uint256,address,add.details: Emitted when the sequencer public key is updated in 'updateSigner()'.

params.newSigner: newSigner new address of the sequencer.
params.nonce: to synchronize the events in themis.
params.oldSigner: oldSigner old address of the sequencer.

params.signerPubkey: signerPubkey public key of the sequencer.

params.nonce: to synchronize the events in themis.
params.sequencerId: unique integer to identify a sequencer.
params.unlockClaimTime: when user can claim locked token.

params.sequencerId: unique integer to identify a sequencer.

Withdraw(uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when the sequencer reduce lock amount in 'withdraw()'.

params.sequencerId: unique integer to identify a sequencer.

params._batchId: The batchId that submitted the reward is that

finalizeUnlock(address,uint256,uint256,u.details: finalizeUnlock the last step to unlock

increaseLocked(uint256,uint256,address,u.details: increaseLocked lock tokens to the sequencer, it can only be called from manager contract

params._locked: the locked amount of the sequencer at last

initializeUnlock(uint256,uint256,uint32,.details: initializeUnlock the first step to unlock      current reward will be distributed

newSequencer(uint256,address,address,uin.details: newSequencer register a new sequencer, it can only be called from manager contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setMaxLock(uint256).details: setMaxLock Allow owner to update max lock amount

setMinLock(uint256).details: updateMinAmounts Allow owner to update min lock amount

setRewardPayer(address).details: setRewardPayer update reward payer address by owner

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._locked: the locked amount of the sequencer at last
